data:
## constant_createTree
> `const` **createTree**: [`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<[`TreeWidget`](#treewidget)\>


Create a Tree with given config props

### Param

an optional tree config

### Returns

a TreeWidget

## constant_getTreeDefaultConfig
> `const` **getTreeDefaultConfig**: () => [`TreeProps`](#treeprops)


Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Tree config

### Returns

[`TreeProps`](#treeprops)

the default Tree config

## interface_NormalizedTreeItem

Normalized TreeItem object

### Properties

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`


Accessibility label for the node

***

#### children

> **children**: `NormalizedTreeItem`[]


An array of children nodes

***

#### isExpanded?

> `optional` **isExpanded**: `boolean`


If `true` the node is expanded

***

#### label

> **label**: `string`


String title of the node

***

#### level

> **level**: `number`


Level in the hierarchy, starts with 0 for a root node

## interface_TreeApi

Interface representing the API for a Tree component.

## class_TreeComponent

TreeComponent is an Angular component that extends the BaseWidgetDirective
to provide a customizable tree widget. This component allows for various
configurations and customizations through its inputs and outputs.

### Properties

#### ariaLabelToggleFn

> `readonly` **ariaLabelToggleFn**: `InputSignal`\<(`label`) => `string` \| `undefined`\>


Return the value for the 'aria-label' attribute of the toggle

##### Param

tree item label

##### Default Value

```ts
(label: string) => `Toggle ${label}`
```

***

#### className

> `readonly` **className**: `InputSignal`\<`string` \| `undefined`\>


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### expandToggle

> `readonly` **expandToggle**: `OutputEmitterRef`\<[`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)\>


An event emitted when the user toggles the expand of the TreeItem.

Event payload is equal to the TreeItem clicked.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### item

> `readonly` **item**: `InputSignal`\<[`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>\>


Slot to change the default tree item

***

#### itemContent

> `readonly` **itemContent**: `InputSignal`\<[`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>\>


Slot to change the default tree item content

***

#### itemToggle

> `readonly` **itemToggle**: `InputSignal`\<[`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>\>


Slot to change the default tree item toggle

***

#### navSelector

> `readonly` **navSelector**: `InputSignal`\<(`node`) => `NodeListOf`\<[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)\> \| `undefined`\>


Retrieves expand items of the TreeItem

##### Param

HTML element that is representing the expand item

##### Default Value

```ts
(node: HTMLElement) => node.querySelectorAll('button')
```

***

#### nodes

> `readonly` **nodes**: `InputSignal`\<[`TreeItem`](#treeitem)[] \| `undefined`\>


Array of the tree nodes to display

##### Default Value

`[]`

***

#### structure

> `readonly` **structure**: `InputSignal`\<[`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)\>\>


Slot to change the default display of the tree

### Accessors

#### api

##### Get Signature

> **get** **api**(): `W`\[`"api"`\]


Retrieves the widget api

###### Returns

`W`\[`"api"`\]

the widget api

***

#### directives

##### Get Signature

> **get** **directives**(): `W`\[`"directives"`\]


Retrieves the widget directives

###### Returns

`W`\[`"directives"`\]

the widget directives

***

#### state

##### Get Signature

> **get** **state**(): [`AngularState`](../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>


Retrieves the widget state. Each property of the state is exposed through an Angular [Signal](https://angular.dev/api/core/Signal)

###### Returns

[`AngularState`](../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>

the widget state

## type alias_TreeContext
> **TreeContext** = [`WidgetSlotContext`](../types#widgetslotcontext)\<[`TreeWidget`](#treewidget)\>


Represents the context for a Tree widget.
This interface is an alias for `WidgetSlotContext<TreeWidget>`.

## constant_treeDefaultItemToggle
> `const` **treeDefaultItemToggle**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>


A constant representing the default slot for tree item toggle.

## constant_treeDefaultSlotItem
> `const` **treeDefaultSlotItem**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>


A constant representing the default slot for tree item.

## constant_treeDefaultSlotItemContent
> `const` **treeDefaultSlotItemContent**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>


A constant representing the default slot for tree item.

## constant_treeDefaultSlotStructure
> `const` **treeDefaultSlotStructure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)\>


A constant representing the default slot for tree structure.

## interface_TreeDirectives

Interface representing various directives used in the Tree component.

### Properties

#### itemAttributesDirective

> **itemAttributesDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)\<\{ `item`: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem); \}\>


Directive to handle attributes for the tree item

***

#### itemToggleDirective

> **itemToggleDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)\<\{ `item`: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem); \}\>


Directive to handle toggle for the tree item

***

#### navigationDirective

> **navigationDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Directive to attach navManager for the tree

## interface_TreeItem

Represents a tree item component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel?

> `optional` **ariaLabel**: `string`


Optional accessibility label for the node

***

#### children?

> `optional` **children**: `TreeItem`[]


Optional array of children nodes

***

#### isExpanded?

> `optional` **isExpanded**: `boolean`


If `true` the node is expanded

***

#### label

> **label**: `string`


String title of the node

## class_TreeItemContentDirective

Directive to provide a template reference for tree item content.

This directive uses a template reference to render the [TreeSlotItemContext](#treeslotitemcontext).

## class_TreeItemDirective

Directive to provide a template reference for tree item.

This directive uses a template reference to render the [TreeSlotItemContext](#treeslotitemcontext).

## class_TreeItemToggleDirective

Directive to provide a template reference for tree item toggle.

This directive uses a template reference to render the [TreeSlotItemContext](#treeslotitemcontext).

## interface_TreeProps

Represents the properties for the Tree component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabelToggleFn

> **ariaLabelToggleFn**: (`label`) => `string`


Return the value for the 'aria-label' attribute of the toggle

##### Parameters

###### label

`string`

tree item label

##### Returns

`string`

##### Default Value

```ts
(label: string) => `Toggle ${label}`
```

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### item

> **item**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>


Slot to change the default tree item

***

#### itemContent

> **itemContent**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>


Slot to change the default tree item content

***

#### itemToggle

> **itemToggle**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>


Slot to change the default tree item toggle

***

#### nodes

> **nodes**: [`TreeItem`](#treeitem)[]


Array of the tree nodes to display

##### Default Value

`[]`

***

#### onExpandToggle

> **onExpandToggle**: (`node`) => `void`


An event emitted when the user toggles the expand of the TreeItem.

Event payload is equal to the TreeItem clicked.

##### Parameters

###### node

[`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)\>


Slot to change the default display of the tree

### Methods

#### navSelector

> **navSelector**(`node`): `NodeListOf`\<[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)\>


Retrieves expand items of the TreeItem

##### Parameters

###### node

[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

HTML element that is representing the expand item

##### Returns

`NodeListOf`\<[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)\>

##### Default Value

```ts
(node: HTMLElement) => node.querySelectorAll('button')
```

## type alias_TreeSlotItemContext
> **TreeSlotItemContext** = [`TreeContext`](#treecontext) & `object`


Represents the context for a tree item, extending the base `TreeContext`
with an additional `item` property.

### Type Declaration

#### item

> **item**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

## interface_TreeState

Represents the state of a Tree component.

### Properties

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### expandedMap

> **expandedMap**: `object`


Getter of expanded state for each tree node

##### get

> **get**(`item`): `boolean` \| `undefined`

###### Parameters

####### item

[`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

###### Returns

`boolean` \| `undefined`

***

#### item

> **item**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>


Slot to change the default tree item

***

#### itemContent

> **itemContent**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>


Slot to change the default tree item content

***

#### itemToggle

> **itemToggle**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>


Slot to change the default tree item toggle

***

#### normalizedNodes

> **normalizedNodes**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)[]


Array of normalized tree nodes

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)\>


Slot to change the default display of the tree

## class_TreeStructureDirective

Directive to provide a template reference for tree structure.

This directive uses a template reference to render the [TreeContext](#treecontext).

## type alias_TreeWidget
> **TreeWidget** = [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`TreeProps`](#treeprops), [`TreeState`](#treestate), [`TreeApi`](#treeapi), [`TreeDirectives`](#treedirectives)\>


Represents a Tree widget component.
